events.name: Resin:events_kidnapping
events.description: Event complex for Resin:events_kidnapping
events.ta1explanation: taking away or transportation of a person against that person's will

events.name: Contributory factors
events.description: Episode for Steps_kairos:container:1
events.ta1explanation: Circumstance that contributes to a result, but is not 100% determinative of outcome

events.name: Planning
events.description: Episode for Steps_kairos:container:2
events.ta1explanation: outline of a strategy for achievement of an objective

events.name: Scrutiny
events.description: Episode for Steps_kairos:container:3
events.ta1explanation: monitoring of behavior, activities, or other changing information, for the purpose of influencing, managing or directing

events.name: Committing crime
events.description: Episode for Steps_kairos:container:4
events.ta1explanation: unlawful act forbidden and punishable by criminal law

events.name: Authority response
events.description: Episode for Steps_kairos:container:5
events.ta1explanation: power to command

events.name: Non authority response
events.description: Episode for Steps_kairos:container:6
events.ta1explanation: final consequence or product of a sequence of actions or events

events.name: Legality
events.description: Episode for Steps_kairos:container:7
events.ta1explanation: system of rules and guidelines, generally backed by governmental authority

events.name: Earnings_and_losses
events.description: consumption and savings opportunity gained by an entity within a specified timeframe
events.ta1explanation: financial motivation for kidnapping operation

events.name: Quarreling
events.description: struggle for agency or power in society, when two or more actors oppose each other in social interaction
events.ta1explanation: conflict between two or more parties that may lead to kidnapping as retribution

events.name: Revenge
events.description: harmful action in response to a grievance
events.ta1explanation: motivation for kidnapping in response to earlier action

events.name: Warning
events.description: preventative measure taken to ensure someone's health
events.ta1explanation: motivation for kidnapping in the attempt to convince other party to follow certain course of action

events.name: Choosing_victim
events.description: act of judging the merits of multiple options and selecting one or more victims
events.ta1explanation: early step in planning process in which kidnapping victim is identified

events.name: Choosing_location
events.description: act of selecting location where to kidnap victim
events.ta1explanation: choice of location where victim is likely to be kidnapped

events.name: Choosing_method
events.description: act of selecting kidnapping methods
events.ta1explanation: choice of how to kidnap victim, including through restraint, coercion, or trickery

events.name: Deciding_communication_protocols
events.description: result of deliberation about how kidnappers should communicate before, during, and after the crime
events.ta1explanation: establishing how to communicate messages about kidnapping operation

events.name: Getting_tools
events.description: purchase of tools necessary for crime
events.ta1explanation: planning for crime involves gathering tools such as restraints

events.name: Getting_vehicle
events.description: Purchase of vehicle necessary for crime
events.ta1explanation: obtaining vehicle for transport of victim from location of kidnapping to other location

events.name: Getting_weapons
events.description: purchase of weapons needed for crime
events.ta1explanation: obtaining weapons possibly needed to intimidate or hurt victim or authorities

events.name: Getting_place_to_keep_victim
events.description: Acquisition of location where victim will stay
events.ta1explanation: obtaining room, house, or other location for short or long-term stay

events.name: Cause_to_be_included_guards
events.description: Employment of personnel needed to guard victim
events.ta1explanation: employing other parties to ensure victim does not escape and is otherwise taken care of

events.name: Physical_surveillance
events.description: monitoring of behavior, activities, or other changing information about victim
events.ta1explanation: early stage in planning to learn about victim

events.name: Know_perception_active
events.description: mental process; act of recognizing attributes of victim
events.ta1explanation: planning stage involving thinking about victim and circumstances about crime

events.name: Cyber_surveillance
events.description: clandestine acquisition of confidential information about victim via online resources
events.ta1explanation: surveillance of victim or associates using social media and other online resources

events.name: Communication
events.description: act of conveying intentions about kidnapping to other members of criminal network
events.ta1explanation: communication ensures criminal network works towards intended objectives

events.name: Motion_traveling
events.description: movement of kidnapper from a place to location where crime is planned
events.ta1explanation: kidnapper moves to location where abduction of victim is likely to be possible

events.name: Violence_attack
events.description: control of victim by kidnapper
events.ta1explanation: crime may involve physical or mental attack on victim

events.name: Kidnapping
events.description: taking away or transportation of a person against that person's will
events.ta1explanation: initiation of crime

events.name: Spatial_removing_victim
events.description: process of removing the victim from a location
events.ta1explanation: early stage in kidnapping involving removal of victim from one location

events.name: Spatial_placing_victim
events.description: net movement of victim from one location to another
events.ta1explanation: movement of victim from initial location to location to restrain victim

events.name: Communication
events.description: act of conveying intended meanings from kidnapper to authorities or non-authorities
events.ta1explanation: initial communication between criminals and authorities to convey intentions

events.name: Request
events.description: act of asking formally for something in return for safety of victim
events.ta1explanation: making clear what the kidnapper wants

events.name: Motion_temporary_stay
events.description: short stay of victim in safehouse or other location
events.ta1explanation: in some cases, victim is moved to different location

events.name: Ransom
events.description: practice of holding a prisoner or item to extort money or property
events.ta1explanation: often kidnapper has financial motivations

events.name: GiveUp
events.description: form of surrender when kidnapper decides to stop crime
events.ta1explanation: through negotiation or other influence the kidnapper decides to capitulate to authorities

events.name: Agree_or_refuse_to_act
events.description: understanding between entities to follow a specific course of conduct
events.ta1explanation: in negotiation, the kidnapper may agree or not with course of action

events.name: Violence_attack_killing
events.description: death of victim as a result of action by kidnapper
events.ta1explanation: the victim dies when negotiation does not lead to outcome kidnapper agrees with

events.name: Physical_surveillance
events.description: monitoring of behavior, activities, or other changing information about the kidnapper
events.ta1explanation: initial stage of authority action to gather information about crime

events.name: Motion_traveling
events.description: movement of authorities to location of kidnapper or victim
events.ta1explanation: moving to location more suitable for negotiation or prevention of additional crimes

events.name: Finding
events.description: physical finding of location of kidnapper or victim
events.ta1explanation: locating the kidnapper or the victim

events.name: Communication
events.description: act of conveying intended meanings between authorities
events.ta1explanation: means of beginning negotiation process

events.name: Communication_expressing_publicly
events.description: revealing of restricted information about crime to public
events.ta1explanation: public may be informed of crime through media announcement

events.name: Request
events.description: act of asking formally for demands of kidnapper
events.ta1explanation: establishing what the kidnapper wants

events.name: Suasion_negotiation
events.description: meeting held between authorities and kidnapper
events.ta1explanation: discussion to determine how both parties can mutually benefit

events.name: Influence
events.description: umbrella term of influence and mode of communication
events.ta1explanation: attempts to prevent additional crimes through discussion or police action

events.name: Getting_ransom
events.description: money made available to secure safety of victim
events.ta1explanation: authorities may have access to financial resources to provdie to kidnapper

events.name: Defending
events.description: act of protecting victim from attack
events.ta1explanation: police action to ensure safety of victim and other members of the public

events.name: Helping
events.description: cooperation between authorities and people impacted by crime
events.ta1explanation: providing resources to community to mitigate negative effects of the crime

events.name: Violence_attack
events.description: attempt to control situation by authorities
events.ta1explanation: police action to bring situation under control including storming location of kidnapper or victim

events.name: Violence_attack_killing
events.description: act of killing the kidnapper or accidental killing of victim
events.ta1explanation: physical force used to end kidnapping operation

events.name: Exchange_victim
events.description: voluntary exchange of victim for other person or resource
events.ta1explanation: in hostage taking situations, kidnapper often wants the release of another person from authority control

events.name: Suasion_negotiation
events.description: meeting held between non-authorities and kidnapper
events.ta1explanation: informal negotiations to secure release of victim

events.name: Getting_ransom
events.description: procuring money to secure safety of victim
events.ta1explanation: non authorities may have personal savings to secure release of victim

events.name: Giving_ransom
events.description: handing over ransom to kidnapper
events.ta1explanation: providing money to kidnapper directly to secure release of victim

events.name: Motion_traveling
events.description: movement of non-authorities to location for delivery of ransom
events.ta1explanation: movement to agreed upon location for exchange of resources

events.name: Communication
events.description: act of conveying intended meanings between non-authorities and kidnapper
events.ta1explanation: establishing what, how, when, and where non authorities should act to secure release of victim

events.name: Investigation
events.description: investigation of crimes by police
events.ta1explanation: formal inquiry into and gathering of data about crime

events.name: Legal_rulings
events.description: proceedings in any civil lawsuit or criminal prosecution
events.ta1explanation: criminal prosecution to establish innocence or guilt of kidnapper

events.name: Judgment_communication
events.description: instruction directed by law, judgment or administrative act to defendant or litigant to obey a certain behavior
events.ta1explanation: often a prison sentence or in some countries death penalty
